About Company: About MSys :We have a unique way of doing things - the MSys Way. Its how we innovate, collaborate, operate and deliver value for our clients. MSys is an innovator in offering IT services and domain specific automation software. MSys together with its unparalleled focus and in-depth technical expertise delivers unprecedented value at an affordable cost in the areas of storage, servers, DR/BC, and virtualization. Apart from services, MSys also offers enabler products including evolutionary end-to-end domain specific software solutions for test automation to its customers. Driven by the vision to be at the core of the evolution in the industry, MSys strives to become a transformational agent. The transformational agent brings constructive changes to their customers and delivers value-added software and business processes.About Digifutura - An MSys Company :We are technology leaders that bring a fresh perspective to problem-solving. Our team follows the agile methodology and ensures that your idea reaches the market and has the first movers advantage at an affordable price tag. We are passionate, knowledgeable and committed to providing our customers the best possible services and solution.DigiFutura is a technology arm of MSys Technologies focusing on UX/UI design, web application development, mobile application development and custom software development across various industries.Mobinius - An MSys Company :  Mobinius – An MSys company is a renowned global techno – solutions provider, aiming at providing hi– tech solutions with an cohesive approach and disruptive technologies across various spectrums ranging from automation, construction, education, information technology, logistics, travel, healthcare & pharma etc. Below are our key offerings: Product development, Cloud on-boarding and migration, UI & UX development, Legacy Modernization, Rapid application development, Mobile strategy and consulting, IOT platforms and apps, Digital – Transformation, Data analytics, Mobinius MoleculesWebsite:- http://www.msystechnologies.comWho We are :For us, office is not just the four walls and a desktop. It is the place where trainees become professionals, professionals become experts and experts become demi-gods. It is the place where our employees turn their aspirations into reality by working on cutting-edge technologies for some of the best companies in the world. If you ever dreamed of being in the company of smartest techies on the planet and to work on the solutions which will redefine ‘tomorrow’ then “MSys” is the right place for you.Culture :Our culture is focused on our Corporate Values --People, Customer Success, Excellence, Innovation, Teamwork, Openness, Social Responsibility and Sustained Profitability. Join a worldwide team of talented, collaborative, innovative people who thrive in a work environment where people can share knowledge and learn from one another. You won’t find a more exciting place to build your career and challenge yourself. Accept the challenge and Go where innovation leads Join MSys !!!Join a workforce that made it to Top-20 :          Storage newsletter has named MSys Technologies as one of the top 20 fastest growing storage companies in the world. We achieved a growth rate of 55% in the last year and this was made possible because of an excellent leadership team and the sheer dedication of our brilliant workforce. We believe in constantly evolving and innovating at our end and the results are being reflected in their own right. If you see yourself as an enthusiast with a creative mend of mind, we invite you to join us in this exciting professional journey.

About Company:
Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. With its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2020 global revenues of €16 billion.

Capgemini in India comprises over 150,000 team members working across 13 locations: Bangalore, Bhubaneswar, Chennai, Coimbatore, Gandhinagar, Gurugram, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, Salem and Tiruchirappalli.
